en.question: Why did I choose to make an online résumé?
en.answer: I wanted to show a glimpse of what I can do, I think a website is more relevant than a piece of paper to show my work. By the way, the code is on [Github](https://github.com/rempartIrien/resume).

en.question: What did I use to make this website?
en.answer: I used Vue.js, Pug and Stylus as technologies and Visual Studio Code as text editor.

en.question: Why have I been to Montreal?
en.answer: After I finished my first year at ENSISA, I thought that there might be something else, something more: I wanted to experiment something new. So, I looked for an alternative to ENSISA scholarship and found the CREPUQ program (now named BCI) which let me apply to École Polytechnique de Montréal. Montreal was a wonderful experience with new methods of working, new pace, new people.

en.question: Why do I want to do more UX and UI?
en.answer: People do not understand and use an application if its interface is unusable or ugly; I want them to be delighted to use my work.

en.question: What was my best work experience?
en.answer: Undoubtedly, it was Elis. For the first time in my life, I was in charge of all the frontend project: I started the project, I created its architecture (component-based), I chose tools, I set the build chain and I developed a graphical framework with AngularJS directives. It was the first time I could do more than code and I loved it.
